GCapsule.h
1 // Capsule.h
3 // ==========
4 // Capsule for OpenGL with (base radius, top radius, height, sectors, stacks)
5 // The min number of sectors (slices) is 3 and the min number of stacks are 1.
6 // - base radius: the radius of the Capsule at z = -height/2
7 // - top radius : the radiusof the Capsule at z = height/2
8 // - height : the height of the Capsule along z-axis
9 // - sectors : the number of slices of the base and top caps
10 // - stacks : the number of subdivisions along z-axis
11 //
12 // AUTHOR: Song Ho Ahn (song.ahn@gmail.com)
13 // CREATED: 2018-03-27
14 // UPDATED: 2019-12-02
15 // See: http://www.songho.ca/opengl/gl_Capsule.html
17 
18 #ifndef GB_GEOMETRY_CAPSULE_H
19 #define GB_GEOMETRY_CAPSULE_H
20 
21 #include <vector>
22 #include <memory>
23 #include "../../geometry/GVector.h"
24 
25 namespace rev {
26 
28 // Forward Declarations
30 class VertexArrayData;
32 class Capsule
33 {
34 public:
35  // ctor/dtor
36  Capsule(VertexArrayData& outVertexData, float radius = 1.0f, float halfHeight = 1.0f, int sectorCount = 36, int stackCount = 1);
37  ~Capsule() {}
38 
39  // getters/setters
40  float getRadius() const { return m_radius; }
41  float getHalfHeight() const { return m_halfHeight; }
42  int getSectorCount() const { return m_sectorCount; }
43  int getStackCount() const { return m_stackCount; }
44  void set(float radius, float halfHeight, int sectorCount, int stackCount);
45  void setRadius(float radius);
46  void setHalfHeight(float height);
47  void setSectorCount(int sectorCount);
48  void setStackCount(int stackCount);
49 
50  VertexArrayData& vertexData() { return m_vertexData; }
51 
52 protected:
53 
54 private:
55  // member functions
56  void clearArrays();
57  void buildVerticesSmooth();
58  void buildUnitCircleVertices();
59  void buildCaps();
60  void addVertex(float x, float y, float z);
61  void addNormal(float x, float y, float z);
62  void addTexCoord(float s, float t);
63  void addIndices(unsigned int i1, unsigned int i2, unsigned int i3);
64  std::vector<Vector3> getSideNormals();
65  Vector3 computeFaceNormal(float x1, float y1, float z1,
66  float x2, float y2, float z2,
67  float x3, float y3, float z3);
68 
69  // member vars
70  float m_radius;
71  float m_halfHeight;
72  int m_sectorCount; // # of slices
73  int m_stackCount; // # of stacks
74  unsigned int m_baseIndex; // starting index of base
75  unsigned int m_topIndex; // starting index of top
76  std::vector<Vector3> m_unitCircleVertices;
77  VertexArrayData& m_vertexData;
78  std::vector<unsigned int> m_lineIndices;
79 
80 };
